verbs.description: In the entertainment church , passion trumps preparation . [ARG1: I] [V: 'm] [ARG2: Jonathan] , and this is the story of how a paralegal became my boss .
In the entertainment church , passion trumps preparation . I 'm Jonathan , and [ARG1: this] [V: is] [ARG2: the story of how a paralegal became my boss] .
In the entertainment church , passion trumps preparation . I 'm Jonathan , and this is the story of [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARG1: a paralegal] [V: became] [ARG2: my boss] .
